subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|艸|alt1=艹|t1=grass|之|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – a type of plant.

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|靈芝|三芝|劉蘭芝|張芝|得挹芝眉|焚芝|焚芝鋤蕙|王仙芝|紫芝|紫芝眉宇|肉芝|芝儀|芝加哥|芝宇|芝標|芝焚蕙嘆|芝田|芝眉|芝艾俱焚|芝草無根|芝蘭|芝蘭之化|芝蘭之室|芝蘭氣味|芝蘭玉樹|芝顏|芝麻|芝麻官|芝麻小事|芝麻油|芝麻秸|芝麻糊|芝麻綠豆|芝麻醬|鄭芝龍|野芝麻|雲芝|龍芝茶|芝麻灣}}

* {{ja-l|芝野|しばの|shibano}}:
* {{ja-l|芝矢|しばや|shibaya}}:
* {{ja-l|芝蘭堂|しらんどう|Shirandō}}: an academy of Western learning in the late [[w:Edo period|Edo period]]
* {{ja-l|芝離宮|しばりきゅう|Shiba Rikyū}}: an [[imperial]] [[villa]], formerly located on the shores of the bay in [[w:Minato, Tokyo|Minato-ku, Tōkyō]], later converted into a [[park]]
* {{ja-l|芝露|しばつゆ|shiba tsuyu}}: [[dew]] on [[grass]]

subSections.title: Verb
subSections.text:
{{ja-verb-suru|しば}}

# short for {{ja-l|芝見||shibami}}: to [[hide]] in the [[grass]] and [[spy]] on one's [[enemies]] or [[scout]] out the situation

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text: Compound of {{compound|ja|sort=しざま|し|tr1=shi|pos1=adjectival ending|様|tr2=sama|t2=kind, type}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> {{rendaku2|sort=しざま|sama|zama}} The kanji {{ja-l|芝}} was used as an [[ateji]], probably based on its {{l|ja|sc=Latn|音読み|''on'yomi''}} of ''shi''.

subSections.title: Noun
Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-l|芝翫下駄|しかんげた|Shikan geta}}: a type of ''[[geta]]'' [[sandal]] popular in the [[w:Edo period|Edo period]]
* {{ja-l|芝翫縞|しかんじま|Shikanjima}}: a particular [[stripe]]d [[pattern]] for [[kimono]], popular in the [[w:Edo period|Edo period]]
* {{ja-l|芝翫茶|しかんちゃ|Shikan cha}}: a [[color]] for [[dying]] [[cloth]], a slightly [[reddish]]-[[purple]] shade of [[chestnut]]
* {{ja-l|芝仙延年|しせんえんねん|shisen ennen}}: a [[theme]] for traditional [[painting]] in China, Korea, and Japan, depicting the {{ja-l|万年茸||mannentake}} [[mushroom]], [[pine]]s, and [[rocky]] [[crag]]s
* {{ja-l|芝仙祝寿|しせんしゅくじゅ|shisen shukuju}}: a [[theme]] for traditional [[painting]] in China, Korea, and Japan, depicting the {{ja-l|万年茸||mannentake}} [[mushroom]], [[crane]]s (the birds), [[bamboo]], and [[plum]] trees
* {{ja-l|芝草|しそう|shisō}}: alternate for {{ja-l|万年茸||mannentake}}, a type of [[mushroom]]
* {{ja-l|芝眉|しび|shibi}}: an [[honorific]] term for referring to someone else's [[face]]
* {{ja-l|芝蘭|しらん|shiran}}: [[fragrant]] [[grass]]; {{qualifier|metaphorically}} an [[excellent]] person
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-l|霊芝|れいし|reishi}}: alternate for {{ja-l|万年茸||mannentake}}, a type of mushroom
{{der-bottom}}
